R

RandomPlayer - Class in com.riskgame.strategy
Random player reinforces random country, attacks random country a random number of times and fortifies a random country(implementation similar to human player but happens in a random fashion)
RandomPlayer() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.strategy.RandomPlayer
 
RandomPlayerTest - Class in com.riskgame.test.strategy
 
RandomPlayerTest() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.test.strategy.RandomPlayerTest
This method is called to initialize test data before all data
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph) - Method in class com.riskgame.controller.PlayerController
This method assigns the number of armies to the player when certain conditions are met.
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph, Country, int) - Method in class com.riskgame.strategy.Aggressive
This method reinforces armies to the strongest country of the Aggressive player
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph, Country, int) - Method in class com.riskgame.strategy.Benevolent
This method reinforces armies to the weakest country of the Benevolent player
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph, Country, int) - Method in class com.riskgame.strategy.Cheater
this method is used for the reinforcement of the cheater player's countries, it doubles the armies on each country
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph, Country, int) - Method in class com.riskgame.strategy.Human
Method to reinforce armies
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph, Country, int) - Method in interface com.riskgame.strategy.PlayerStrategy
Reinforcement of armies to the player owned countries
reinforcementPhase(Player, GameMapGraph, Country, int) - Method in class com.riskgame.strategy.RandomPlayer
Reinforcement phase of the random player.
reinforcementPhaseTest() - Method in class com.riskgame.test.strategy.AggressiveTest
This method tests the reinforcement for aggressive checks whether it reinforces its strongest country or not
reinforcementPhaseTest() - Method in class com.riskgame.test.strategy.BenevolentTest
This method tests the reinforcement for benevolent, checks whether it reinforces its weakest country or not
removeAdjacency() - Method in class com.riskgame.controller.CreateMapController
This method aims to remove adjacency between two countries.
RiskMainView - Class in com.riskgame.view
RiskMain class launches the Risk Game and provided options for the users to create a new map or load an existing map in-order to begin the game.
RiskMainView() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.view.RiskMainView
RiskMain constructor contains the action to be performed on the click create map, load map and exit buttons.
RoundRobinController - Class in com.riskgame.controller
RoundRobinScheduler class is to iterate the Player turns.
RoundRobinController(ArrayList<Player>) - Constructor for class com.riskgame.controller.RoundRobinController
RoundRobinScheduler Constructor
